edu.xtec.jclic.edit

Interface Editable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Activity, ActivityBag, ActivityBagElement, ActivitySequence, ActivitySequenceElement, Arith, AutoContentProvider, Complete, ComplexAssociation, CrossWord, DoublePuzzle, ExchangePuzzle, Explore, FillInBlanks, HolePuzzle, Identify, Identify, InformationScreen, JClicProject, MediaBag, MediaBagElement, MemoryGame, Menu, MenuElement, Order, ProjectLibrary, ProjectSettings, SimpleAssociation, TagReplace, TextActivityBase, WordSearch, WrittenAnswer

    public interface Editable
    Classes that implement this interface have always an associated Editor. The interface has one single method to implement: getEditor.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Editor getEditor(Editor parent)
      Returns the Editor associated to this object.

    • Method Detail

      • getEditor

        Editor getEditor(Editor parent)
        Returns the Editor associated to this object.
        Parameters:
        parent - Editors can have a parent editor. Childs should communicate its changes to parents, and changes in parents should affect its childs. This parameter can be null in stand-alone objects.
        Returns:
        An Editor for this object.
